articles.description: Fabianski, 35, has become a mainstay of West Ham's improvement under Moyes, but is out of contract in the summer while Rice has been a repeated target for Chelsea.
articles.content: David Moyes wants West Ham to secure goalkeeper Lukasz Fabianski on a new deal in the next few weeks and is also hopeful his board will reward star man Declan Rice improved terms to fend off Chelsea … [+1887 chars]
